statements.select: select a.*,b.StationId,b.OldManName,c.SickBedNo,d.ExtNo,d.RoomNo,e.ItemName,x.UserName,y.CallNo From Pam_WorkExecute a inner join Oca_OldManBaseInfo b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId and ISNULL(b.StationId,'')<>'' and b.StationId<>'null' and b.Status=3 and b.ResidentStatus=7 inner join Pam_RoomOldMan c on b.OldManId=c.OldManId and a.RoomId=c.RoomId and GETDATE() between c.BeginDate and c.EndDate inner join Pam_Room d on c.RoomId = d.RoomId and d.Status=1 inner join Sys_DictionaryItem e on a.WorkItem=e.ItemId and e.DictionaryId='13001' inner join Pub_User x on a.UserId = x.UserId left join Pam_ServeMan y on a.UserId = y.UserId left join Pam_UserMappingRoom z on z.RoomId=a.RoomId where DATEDIFF(d,a.RemindTime,GETDATE())=0 and b.StationId=#StationId# $WhereClause$ z.UserId=#UserId# order by d.FloorNo,d.RoomNo,a.RemindTime desc

select a.*,b.SickBedNo,c.RoomNo,c.ExtNo,c.FloorNo,d.CallNo from Pam_WorkExecute a inner join Pam_RoomOldMan b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId and a.RoomId=b.RoomId and GETDATE() between b.BeginDate and b.EndDate inner join Pam_Room c on c.RoomId=b.RoomId inner join Pam_ServeMan d on a.UserId=d.UserId where DATEDIFF(D,a.RemindTime,GETDATE())=0 and a.ServeManArriveTime is null and GETDATE() > a.RemindTime and a.Reminded < a.RemindMax
statements.update: update Pam_WorkExecute set Reminded=(case when RemindMax>Reminded then Reminded+1 else Reminded end), LastScanTime=(case when RemindMax>Reminded then GETDATE() else LastScanTime end) where Id in('$Ids$')
statements.select:
select 1 as NoUse,* From (select a.*,b.IDNo,b.Gender,b.OldManName,b.Mobile,b.Tel,b.InputCode1, b.InputCode2,b.Address,b.StationId,c.SickBedNo,d.ExtNo,d.FloorNo,d.RoomNo,e.ItemName,x.UserName,y.CallNo From Pam_WorkExecute a inner join Oca_OldManBaseInfo b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId and ISNULL(b.StationId,'')<>'' and b.StationId<>'null' and b.Status=3 and b.ResidentStatus=7 inner join Pam_RoomOldMan c on b.OldManId=c.OldManId and a.RoomId=c.RoomId and GETDATE() between c.BeginDate and c.EndDate inner join Pam_Room d on c.RoomId = d.RoomId and d.Status=1 inner join Sys_DictionaryItem e on a.WorkItem=e.ItemId and e.DictionaryId='13001' inner join Pub_User x on a.UserId = x.UserId left join Pam_ServeMan y on a.UserId = y.UserId left join Pam_UserMappingRoom z on z.RoomId=a.RoomId and x.UserId=z.UserId
a.CheckInTime>=#CheckInTime_Start# a.CheckInTime<=#CheckInTime_End# a.ServeManArriveTime>=#ServeManArriveTime_Start# a.ServeManArriveTime<=#ServeManArriveTime_End# a.ServeManLeaveTime>=#ServeManLeaveTime_Start# a.ServeManLeaveTime<=#ServeManLeaveTime_End# a.RemindTime>=#RemindTime_Start# a.RemindTime<=#RemindTime_End# a.PlanEndTime>=#PlanEndTime_Start# a.PlanEndTime<=#PlanEndTime_End# a.LastScanTime>=#LastScanTime_Start# a.LastScanTime<=#LastScanTime_End#
) m
Id=#Id# UserId=#UserId# RoomId=#RoomId# OldManId=#OldManId# WorkItem=#WorkItem# Reminded=#Reminded# RemindMax=#RemindMax# PlayRepeats=#PlayRepeats# OldManName=#OldManName# Gender=#Gender# IDNo=#IDNo# Address=#Address# Tel=#Tel# Mobile=#Mobile# InputCode1=#InputCode1# InputCode2=#InputCode2# StationId=#StationId# SickBedNo=#SickBedNo# FloorNo=#FloorNo# RoomNo=#RoomNo# ExtNo=#ExtNo# CallNo=#CallNo# $WhereClause$

select r.RoomId,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.StationId as StationIdR,r.FloorNo ,ro.BeginDate,ro.EndDate,ro.SickBedNo ,p.OldManId,p.OldManName,p.Gender,p.IDNo,p.HealthInsuranceFlag,p.SocialInsuranceFlag,p.StationId as StationIdP from Pam_Room r right join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on r.RoomId=ro.RoomId left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo p on ro.OldManId=p.OldManId where p.Status=3 and p.ResidentStatus=7 and ro.roomId=#RoomId# and ro.EndDate>GETDATE() and r.StationId=#StationId# and p.StationId=#StationId#

select c.CheckInTime,c.Content,DoStatus,c.DoResults,a.* from Oca_CallService c left join ( select p.OldManId,p.OldManName,p.Gender,p.IDNo, ro.SickBedNo,r.RoomId,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.StationId,r.FloorNo from Oca_OldManBaseInfo p left join Pam_RoomOldMan ro on p.OldManId=ro.OldManId right join Pam_Room r on ro.RoomId=r.RoomId where r.Status=1 and p.Status=3 and p.ResidentStatus=7 and ro.EndDate>GETDATE() ro.StationId=#StationId# ro.RoomId=#RoomId# $WhereClause$ ) a on c.OldManId=a.OldManId where c.DataSource='00006' $WhereClause2$

select 1 as NoUse,u.UserId,u.Status UStatus,u.UserCode,u.UserName,u.Gender UGender,u.InputCode1 UInputCode1,u.InputCode2 UInputCode2, p.OldManId,p.Status PStatus,p.OldManName,p.Gender PGender,p.IDNo,p.InputCode1 PInputCode1,p.InputCode2 PInputCode2, r.RoomId,r.Status RStatus,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.FloorNo, w.WorkItem,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13001',w.WorkItem) WorkItemName , w.ServeManArriveTime,w.ServeManLeaveTime,w.RemindTime,w.PlanEndTime,w.Reminded,w.RemindMax,w.PlayRepeats from Pub_User u right join Pam_WorkExecute w on u.UserId=w.UserId left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo p on w.OldManId=p.OldManId left join Pam_Room r on w.RoomId=r.RoomId
UserId=#UserId# u.Status=#UStatus# u.UserCode=#UserCode# u.UserName=#UserName# u.Gender=#UGender# StopFlag=#StopFlag# u.InputCode1=#UInputCode1# u.InputCode2=#UInputCode2#
p.OldManId=#OldManId# p.Status=#PStatus# p.ResidentStatus=#PResidentStatus# p.OldManName=#OldManName# p.Gender=#PGender# p.IDNo=#IDNo# p.InputCode1=#PInputCode1# p.InputCode2=#PInputCode2# p.StationId=#PStationId#
r.RoomId=#RoomId# r.Status=#RStatus# r.RoomNo=#RoomNo# r.ExtNo=#ExtNo# r.BedNo=#BedNo# r.OccupancyNumber=#OccupancyNumber# r.StationId=#RStationId# r.FloorNo=#FloorNo#
w.WorkItem=#WorkItem# w.RemindTime>=#RemindTime_Start# w.RemindTime<=#RemindTime_End# w.Reminded=#Reminded# w.RemindMax=#RemindMax# w.PlayRepeats=#PlayRepeats# $WhereClause$

select x.* from ( select top ($PageNo$*$PageSize$) row_number() over(Order By $OrderByClause$) as SN, u.UserId,u.Status UStatus,u.UserCode,u.UserName,u.Gender UGender,u.InputCode1 UInputCode1,u.InputCode2 UInputCode2, p.OldManId,p.Status PStatus,p.OldManName,p.Gender PGender,p.IDNo,p.InputCode1 PInputCode1,p.InputCode2 PInputCode2, r.RoomId,r.Status RStatus,r.RoomNo,r.ExtNo,r.BedNo,r.OccupancyNumber,r.FloorNo, w.WorkItem,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13001',w.WorkItem) WorkItemName , w.ServeManArriveTime,w.ServeManLeaveTime,w.RemindTime,w.PlanEndTime,w.Reminded,w.PlayRepeats from Pub_User u right join Pam_WorkExecute w on u.UserId=w.UserId left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo p on w.OldManId=p.OldManId left join Pam_Room r on w.RoomId=r.RoomId
UserId=#UserId# u.Status=#UStatus# u.UserCode=#UserCode# u.UserName=#UserName# u.Gender=#UGender# StopFlag=#StopFlag# u.InputCode1=#UInputCode1# u.InputCode2=#UInputCode2#
p.OldManId=#OldManId# p.Status=#PStatus# p.ResidentStatus=#PResidentStatus# p.OldManName=#OldManName# p.Gender=#PGender# p.IDNo=#IDNo# p.InputCode1=#PInputCode1# p.InputCode2=#PInputCode2# p.StationId=#PStationId#
r.RoomId=#RoomId# r.Status=#RStatus# r.RoomNo=#RoomNo# r.ExtNo=#ExtNo# r.BedNo=#BedNo# r.OccupancyNumber=#OccupancyNumber# r.StationId=#RStationId# r.FloorNo=#FloorNo#
w.WorkItem=#WorkItem# w.RemindTime>=#RemindTime_Start# w.RemindTime<=#RemindTime_End# w.Reminded=#Reminded# w.RemindMax=#RemindMax# w.PlayRepeats=#PlayRepeats# $WhereClause$
)x where x.SN > ($PageNo$-1)*$PageSize$

select isnull(p.OldManName,'') as OldManName ,isnull(dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('13001',w.WorkItem),'') as WorkItem ,isnull(u.UserName,'') as UserName ,isnull(r.RoomNo,'') as RoomNo ,w.RemindTime,w.ServeManArriveTime,w.ServeManLeaveTime from Pam_WorkExecute w left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo p on w.OldManId=p.OldManId left join Pam_Room r on w.RoomId=r.RoomId left join Pub_User u on w.UserId=u.UserId where p.StationId=#ServeStationId# and r.StationId=#ServeStationId# and r.Status=1 and DATEDIFF( D,w.RemindTime,GETDATE())=0 and ( (abs(DATEDIFF( MINUTE,GETDATE(),w.RemindTime))<=#timeSpanOfMinute# and w.ServeManArriveTime is null) or ( w.ServeManArriveTime is not null and w.ServeManLeaveTime is null ) or (abs(DATEDIFF( MINUTE,GETDATE(),w.ServeManLeaveTime))<=#timeSpanOfMinute# and w.ServeManArriveTime is not null) ) order by w.RemindTime asc

select SUM(Num1) undo,SUM(Num2) doing,SUM(Num3) doed,SUM(Num1+Num2+Num3) count from ( select case when ServeManArriveTime IS NULL then 1 else 0 end Num1 , case when ServeManArriveTime IS not NULL and ServeManLeaveTime IS NULL then 1 else 0 end Num2 , case when ServeManArriveTime IS not NULL and ServeManLeaveTime IS not NULL then 1 else 0 end Num3 from Pam_WorkExecute w left join Oca_OldManBaseInfo p on w.OldManId=p.OldManId left join Pam_Room r on w.RoomId=r.RoomId where DATEDIFF( D,RemindTime,GETDATE())=0 and RemindTime <=GETDATE() and p.StationId=#ServeStationId# and r.StationId=#ServeStationId# ) m
statements.delete: delete from Pam_WorkExecute where Id in ( select a.Id from Pam_WorkExecute a inner join pub_PensionAgencyUser b on a.UserId=b.UserId where b.StationId=#StationId# and a.ServeManArriveTime is null and a.RemindTime>GETDATE())
